alert.note: Alert for Upper Tanana Valley and the Fortymile Country (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 21 at 5:14AM AKDT until April 23 at 12:00PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON AKDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 7 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Upper Tanana Valley and the Fortymile Country. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to noon AKDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strong northeast winds will develop Friday evening and continue into Sunday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Upper Tanana Valley and the Fortymile Country
